comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: More pictures of the Old Reach at www.francisfrith.com/thorpe-st-andrew/photos/the-old-reac... wherrymansweb.blogspot.com/2010/05/thorpe-st-andrews-swan... explains that the Old Reach was the natural path of the River Yare before the railway was built. A new cut was made for the river traffic. That is probably where the "New Reach" photochrom view was taken.
